title: Datetime format inconsistency between dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from a table exhibit inconsistent formatting when displayed in a dynamic text item and a data/text item. Description: Datetime values retrieved from a table show different formats in a dynamic text item and a data/text item.
EB: When inputting 'new Date()' as the content for three items, saving, and previewing, the expected result is that they should all display the same date format. The actual result is that the data and text item display the same format, but the dynamic text item displays a different format.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Input 'new Date()' as content for three items.
2. Save the changes.
3. Preview the items. The expected result is that they should all show the same date format, but the actual result is that the data and text item show the same format, while the dynamic text item displays a different format.
